root.message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 6-b-1, translated into en
root.data: The country has a legal framework of policies and standards that assign competences at local levels to the participation of communities in the management of water supply and sanitation services. Although such a situation exists, there are problems in the operationality of the committees due to the fact that their members do not have the necessary technical expertise in this area.
